p: The development of new neutralizing assays that overcome the restrictions presented by the conventional PRNT methods become a priority for ZIKV. To this aim, we took advantage of our previously developed GFP reporter ZIKV (recombinant ZIKV GFP), which had been demonstrated to be a powerful tool for the monitoring of virus replication as well as the screening of antiviral compounds [ 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20]. In routine, ZIKV GFP infection is observed by flow cytometry analysis at 18â€“24 h post-infection based on the GFP signal. In the present study, we identified MR766 GFP as a variant of ZIKV GFP exhibiting a greater propensity to produce a GFP signal associated with a higher virus progeny production.
